Title: Relates to safe staffing levels at nursing homes
Summary: Relates to safe staffing levels at nursing homes; requires the department of health to give significant weight to labor supply shortages in particular regions during any declared statewide disaster emergency.
LawCode: Amd ยง2895-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to safe staffing levels at nursing homes
